conclusion: Determine which container (E, F, or G) the liquid from A, B, C, and D will flow into after passing through the baffles.
Green liquid from A flows down and to the right past the orange baffle.
Green liquid from A will flow into container E.
Purple liquid from B flows down and to the right past the orange baffle.
Purple liquid from B will flow into container F.
Blue liquid from C flows down and to the left past the purple baffle.
Blue liquid from C will flow into container F.
Pink liquid from D flows down and to the right past the purple baffle.
Pink liquid from D will flow into container G.
Summary of flow directions: A to E, B to F, C to F, D to G.
Conclusion: A flows into E, B and C flow into F, D flows into G.
